column3: Create Conversation
column13:
Using the  POST /api/v2/aihub/converse/conversations endpoint, a conversation should get created, all documents passed as part of the request body should get uploaded and processing for them triggered in the background.

If no name and description is passed for a conversation, a unique name should be assigned to the conversation.

Documents under nested folder can be uploaded to the API, they key will hold the path along with the file name. Ex: f1/w2.pdf. As part of the get_converstaion API, we should see the relative path for the file.

If no documents are passed, conversation will be created without files.
column16:
The following ops should be done as part of this endpoint:

  1. Create a conversation.
  2. Add documents in the request - To be verified by looking at the upload status returned in response.
  3. name for a Conversation can provided in two formats
    1. Query Param - {base_url}/api/v2/aihub/converse/conversations?name={sample_name}
    2. Body(multipart/form-data)
  4. Verify request with/without enable_object_detection - to be verified for these cases: boolean("true"/"True", "false"/"False"), invalid values(any value other than boolean). To be verified using Get Settings API.
  5. Trigger document processing in the background - To be checked by calling the Get Conversation endpoint using the conversation_id returned by this endpoint.
